Subskills.name: Sharpened Cleavers
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by blender.

Subskills.name: Industrial Sized
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of blender.

Subskills.name: A.I. Empowered Nanoblenders
Subskills.description: Summon multiple small blenders orbiting around you.

Subskills.name: No Bits Nor Pieces
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using blender.

Subskills.name: Extra Cleaver Addon
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of blades on blender.

Subskills.name: Obsidian Blades
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by blender.

Subskills.name: Attachment Malfunction
Subskills.description: Chance to send blades towards target on hit briefly returning back to you.

Subskills.name: Blending Blood Pact
Subskills.description: Blender gains increased damage but killing monsters drains a portion of your maximum life. This effect is non-lethal and will de-activate blender if you cannot sacrifice your life anymore.

Subskills.name: It Will Blend
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Blood Thirsting Killing Machine
Subskills.description: Chance to gain a stack of blood thirst on hit increasing your movement speed for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Will it Blend?
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back dealing increased damage and slowing them.

Subskills.name: Blenderang
Subskills.description: Throw a traveling blender towards target location returning back to you shortly. Blender cooldown is reduced.

Subskills.name: Attachable Microblades
Subskills.description: Chance to conjure a small blender at target location on hit dealing additional damage for a short duration.
